title: Why Biden is Way Worse Than You Think
itunes:title: Why Biden is Way Worse Than You Think
description:
If your small business has been directly affected by the Biden Regime, this is the episode for you. Charlie is joined by Joe Concha, Fox News Contributor and author of the new book, ‘Come On Man! The Truth About Joe Biden’s Terrible, Horrible, No Good, Very Bad Presidency,’ and Alfredo Ortiz, CEO and President of the Job Creators Network, to have an insightful conversation surrounding middle income families, Biden’s terrible economic policies, and how to save small businesses. Charlie gets to the bottom of some unbelievable financial moves from the Biden Administration, and he unpacks the pain it will cause for everyday citizens.

Support the show: http://www.charliekirk.com/support

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
